revised_title: Observations on the Effects of Nerve Section in Frogs
tldr: The author conducted experiments on the section of the glossopharyngeal and hypoglossal nerves of frogs and observed the alterations in the structure of their primitive fibers. The study aimed to describe the changes in the nerves after their continuity with the brain was interrupted by section. The findings provide insights into the effects of nerve section and the potential for nerve regeneration.
